name: MinigolfPark VR
description: Experience VR minigolf on a variety of courses. Play by swinging the club like you would in real life by using motion controllers. Fully supports Oculus Rift.
minimum_requirements: Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater Storage: 500 MB available space
